title: Curse of the Were-Woman #1
creator: DEVILS DUE DIGITAL, INC. A Checker Digital Company

extendedInfo.description: Fortune 500 exec, obsessive womanizer, and all-around jerk Patrick Dalton finds himself cursed by an angry, jilted lover... a curse that causes him to transform into a woman each night! With the tables turned, can he continue his misogynistic life? Weird Science meets Ms. Doubtfire in this hilarious, all-new original graphic novel created and written by indie sensation Jason M. Burns.
